title: Can't install league
body: http://prntscr.com/c42q1f say invalid d dirve when I only have a c drive

replies.body:
During the installation process, it may ask or show the directory it's going to install to. Be sure it looks like the directory below, and if it doesn't change it.

> C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Let me know if you have issues after making that change.
Alright so when i install it says older version of league of legends cannot be removed

Ah. So that error means there are residual files left over from a previous install of League. I recommend grabbing our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to complete a clean reinstall of League. 

After installing the application, run it and check the boxes for **Reinstall** and **Clean uninstall**. After it's finished running, launch League to finish patching. 

Let me know if this helped.
